title: Congratulations to Recent MEDS Graduates!
description:
A hearty congratulations to our recent graduates for completing 
their PhD in the MEDS program. Check out the details here.
contents:
Congratulations to Recent MEDS Graduates!
A hearty congratulations to our recent graduates for completing their Ph.D. in the MEDS program:
Dr. Seyma N. Yildirim-Erbasli (Assistant Professor at Concordia University of Edmonton)
Dr. Tahereh Firoozi (Senior Psychometrician at Alberta Education)
Dr. Yizhu Gao (Senior Data Analyst at Ministry of Children’s Services, Government of Alberta)

title: Welcome to the New MEDS Website
description:
Have you checked out our new website yet? We’re excited to announce 
that the new MEDS website has been launched, built from the ground up 
with a fresh look! Check out the details here.
contents:
New Website Announcement
Have you checked out our new website yet?
We’re excited to announce that the new MEDS website has been launched, built from the ground up with a fresh look!

https://sites.google.com/ualberta.ca/meds

The new website provides most recent information on the MEDS program, including our graduate courses, program-related news, and many resources for current and prospective students.
